title: Live Updates: Shinzo Abe, Japan's former prime minister, critically wounded after shooting
content:
1. Live Updates: Shinzo Abe, Japan's former prime minister, critically wounded after shooting  The Associated Press - en Español
  2. Shinzo Abe Dies After Being Shot in Japan: Live Updates  The New York Times
  3. Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe dies after being shot: NHK media  Fox News
  4. Shinzo Abe Shooting: Japan, Known for Safety, Is in Shock  Bloomberg
  5. Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe in a state of cardiopulmonary arrest after possible shooting, fire department says  CNN
